 i nsert  a urinary catheter, at least size 18 G, and empty the bladder
 fill the woman’s bladder with 400 mL of normal saline and clamp the catheter
 start an IV infusion of Sodium Chloride 0,9%
 give a slow Salbutamol bolus, 250 mcg IV, slowly over 2 minutes.
• Reconstitute the solution as follows: Add 1 mL (i.e., 0.5 mg/mL) salbutamol to 9 mL
